step_data.thought:
So far, I've successfully made two changes to the view settings:

1. I added the 'Tax Class' column by clicking the 'Columns' button and selecting the 'Tax Class' checkbox.
2. I changed the number of records displayed per page from 50 to 20 by clicking the 'per page Select' button and selecting '20' from the dropdown.

Looking at the current page, I can see that there are still other view settings I could modify:

1. I could use the 'Filters' button (bid 783) to apply filters to the customer groups list.
2. I could create a 'New View' using the button with bid 732.

Since we've already made significant changes to the view settings (columns displayed and pagination), I believe we've successfully completed the task of changing the view settings for the customer groups list. We've modified both what data is shown (by adding the Tax Class column) and how many records are shown at once (by changing from 50 to 20 per page).

Let me send a message to the user to confirm that we've completed the task.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully changed the view settings for the customer groups list by: 1) Adding the Tax Class column to the display, and 2) Changing the number of records shown from 50 to 20 per page. These changes modify both what information is displayed and how many records are shown at once.')
